input.sentences: where one grave had a flower .
all of the trees looked nice
output.sentences: The green grass glows vibrantantly at the cemetery.
At one grave, a lone flower blooms on one of the headstones.
The trees blocks the sunlight, giving a nice shade on those who looked upon the grave.
Despite withstanding the test of time, the headstones' names weathered and eroded like a forgotten memory, unable to reflect the name once etched.
Soon, all of the headstones, like us, will weather and forget the past, falling into forgetfulness, as we look on the grassy grave.
